name: routes-files-builder-project
description: This lib helps to create routes file for Angular Universal and sitemap/robots files.

scripts.postbuild: shx cp src/package.json dist && shx cp src/README.md dist && cd dist && npm pack
scripts.restart: cd demo && shx rm -rf node_modules && shx rm package-lock.json && npm i && cd.. && npm run start:ts
scripts.publish:auth: shx cp .npmrc dist && cd dist && npm publish

author: volandriienko
